pr_title: Enhance maintainability at springboot kie-server-integ-tests-policy pom

timeline.message: Enhance maintainability at springboot kie-server-integ-tests-policy pom

timeline.bodyText: Just a check - this will add empty string as a system property, right?
timeline.author: MarianMacik
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -48,6 +48,9 @@
     <failsafe.excluded.groups/>
     <!-- Sybase driver leaks its Timestamp implementation. To correctly handle it we need to add driver as additional test classpath. -->
     <maven.jdbc.driver.jar/>
+    <!-- No policy activated by default but overwritten at kie-server-integ-tests-policy -->
+    <org.kie.server.policy.activate/>

replies.bodyText:
Right, though empty will behave as null, because here won't get anything:
https://github.com/kiegroup/droolsjbpm-integration/blob/master/kie-server-parent/kie-server-services/kie-server-services-common/src/main/java/org/kie/server/services/impl/policy/PolicyManager.java#L94-L95
replies.author: gmunozfe

timeline.message: Enhance maintainability at springboot kie-server-integ-tests-policy pom
Enhance maintainability at springboot kie-server-integ-tests-policy pom
